SEARCH
Package com.mygdx.game

Class PlayerProfile

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.PlayerProfile
public class PlayerProfile extends Object
Represents a player when not on the game board.

Stores all the student's persistent information, including their highest achieved individual game score, overall lifetime score (the cumulative score from all played games), their knowledge level, and the tips they have unlocked.
Author:
Karmen Minhas (kminhas7), Joelene Hales (jhales5)
